message.content:
I need to identify the total income (revenue) and its component sub-items from the income statement.

Looking at the statement, I can see:
- "Total Revenue" of 4879769.51
- Its constituent line item is "Main Business Revenue" with the same value of 4879769.51

Based on the example, I need to extract the total income value and then decompose it into its component sub-item.

The total income value is 4879769.51 (Total Revenue).
The component sub-item is "Main Business Revenue" with a value of 4879769.51.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '4879769.51', 'sub_items': {'sub_item value': '4879769.51'}}}
```
